English:
Shift to multiply slider movement by 10 (more speed)
Alt to reduce slider movement by 10 (more precision)
Ctrl to reduce slider movement by 100 (greatest precision)
Don't change camera rotation when following vehicles or citizens
When this is selected camera zooming will be offset towards the mouse cursor (instead of aligned to the middle of the screen)
Please refer to the mod's Steam Workshop page for further information.
This means that the mod is not able to operate and has shut down.
column3: Warning message letting the user know that the mod can't work.

English: The mod was unable to properly apply its required Harmony patches.
column3: Warning message that a patching problem was detected, and the mod can't operate.

English: Possible causes of this problem include:
column3: Header for list of possible causes of Harmony errors.

English: The required Harmony 2 mod dependency was not installed
column3: Possible cause of Harmony error - Harmony not installed.

English: An old and/or broken mod is preventing Harmony 2 from operating properly
column3: Possible cause of Harmony error - a broken mod (not this one) can cause things to stop working.

English: Another mod may be trying to apply a conflicting Harmony patch
column3: Possible cause of Harmony error - two mods trying to patch the same thing at once.
Warning message that a mod conflict was detected.
Part of the mod conflict warning notification - header for the list of conflicting mods.

English: These mods must be removed before ACME can operate.
